title: ASAN Agency
author: ASAN Agency
content: ASAN Token AirDrop Event(5,000$)(4 weeks)■ How to apply1. Create a Metamask Wallet or  Kaikas WalletMetamask Link - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/metamask/nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknnKaikas Link - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/kaikas/jblndlipeogpafnldhgmapagcccfchpi2. Add Klaytn Mainnet to the Metamask.(Not applicable for kaikas)In the Select Network window, click Add Network to enter the information below. - Network Name : Klaytn Mainnet - RPC URL : https://public-node-api.klaytnapi.com/v1/cypress - Chain ID : 8217 - Currency Symbol : KLAY - Block Explorer : https://scope.klaytn.com3. Fill out the airdrop application form accurately. - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1gkFxqw_qBZvty9uUPED_P5ChrhyksXGPhi9lG8OxYMI/edit4. The contact code of ASAN Token will be announced through social networks. Join all ASAN Groups. - Twitter : https://twitter.com/AsanVerse - Telegram : https://t.me/ASANToken - Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/asanverse/ - Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/asanverse/ - Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjlmMbFMDA2vwT0RJhxFjsg - Kakao : https://open.kakao.com/o/g06kB27d  (CODE - asan88) - WebSite : https://www.asanverse.io/■ Airdrop Contents - Total Airdrop Token : 30,000,000 ASAN - Participation Rewards : 30,000 ASAN - Remaining tokens will be paid equally to all participants after the end of the event.■ Upcoming event - NFT Airdrops that can be traded on the ASAN NFT Exchange■ Points to Note1. This event is limited to one application per person.2. If duplicate wins (n times per person) are confirmed after the announcement of the winner, the win may be canceled.3. If the event applicant's wallet account is created illegally or abnormally, the application acceptance/winning may be canceled.4. ASAN VERSEL LTD. and Asan Art Culture Co., Ltd. are not responsible for the disadvantages of applicants due to unfamiliarity with the contents of the event.
